Room.Name: Monument Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Monument Avenue, just south of the Shrine of Annam.
Room.LongDescription: The small, abandoned building on the north side of the road was recently renovated by some rebellious believers as the Shrine of Annam. Annam is the Great Creator of all life in the universe. This believe was primarily believed only by the giants and half-giants of the realm, but their word has spread to some of the other races, most notably including humans.
